dct_title_s: Map of the country 40 miles around San Francisco
dct_description_sm: compiled from United States surveys by Leander Ransom General Land Agent, San Francisco Cal.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows mountain peaks, vegetation, drainage, county lines, cities and towns, city plans, ranchos, missions, churches, mines, roads, railroads.
"Entered according to act of Congress in the year 1860, by L. Ransom in the Clerks office of the District Court for the Northern District of California."
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
